mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_fine_mas ( VLT_DT, VLT_ATIME, VHCL_NO, FINE_SEQ, VLT_KIND_CD, SEND_PLC_CD, SEND_PLC_SEQ, VLT_CTS, VLT_PNT, RCPT_DT, PYMT_DDAY_DT, PYMT_DT, CFMT_DT, SEND_DT, SEND_EMP_NO, FINE_AMT, NTCDOC_KIND_CD, NTCDOC_DOC_NO, NTCDOC_IMG_URL, ACT_BANK_NM1, ACT_NO1, ACT_BANK_NM2, ACT_NO2, ACT_BANK_NM3, ACT_NO3, ACT_BANK_NM4, ACT_NO4, DRVR_CHGE_DT, FINE_UPLOAD_CD, DOC_FINE_NO1, DOC_FINE_NO2, DOC_FINE_NO3, DOC_FINE_NO4, PNLT_STAT_NM, FIRST_REGR_ID, FIRST_REG_TSTMP, FIRST_REG_IP_ADDR, LAST_CHNGMN_ID, LAST_CHGE_TSTMP, LAST_CHGE_IP_ADDR ) VALUES ( #{vltDt}, #{vltAtime}, #{vhclNo}, #{fineSeq}, #{vltKindCd}, #{sendPlcCd}, #{sendPlcSeq}, #{vltCts}, #{vltPnt}, #{rcptDt}, #{pymtDdayDt}, #{pymtDt}, #{cfmtDt}, #{sendDt}, #{sendEmpNo}, #{fineAmt}, #{ntcdocKindCd}, #{ntcdocDocNo}, #{ntcdocImgUrl}, #{actBankNm1}, #{actNo1}, #{actBankNm2}, #{actNo2}, #{actBankNm3}, #{actNo3}, #{actBankNm4}, #{actNo4}, #{drvrChgeDt}, #{fineUploadCd}, #{docFineNo1}, #{docFineNo2}, #{docFineNo3}, #{docFineNo4}, #{pnltStatNm}, #{firstRegrId}, #{firstRegTstmp}, #{firstRegIpAddr}, #{lastChngmnId}, #{lastChgeTstmp}, #{lastChgeIpAddr} )
